name: currentsong
title: CurrentSong
author: Paco Hobi
description: Writes the current playing song from popular music sites to a text file and a XML file
author: Paco Hobi

preferences.name: saveFolder
preferences.title: Folder
preferences.description: Folder in which the song info will be saved

preferences.name: infoFormat
preferences.title: Format
preferences.description:
Format of the saved song information:
	%song% will be replaced by the song name
	%artist% will be replaced by the artist name
	%album% will be replaced by the album name

preferences.name: interval
preferences.title: Interval
preferences.description: Time in seconds to wait between new song checks

preferences.name: notify
preferences.title: Notifications
preferences.description: If enabled a notification will be shown when a new song starts
